channel.title: [Release] Staff Capes [Release] (REDOWNLOAD PLEASE, BUG IS FIXED!)
channel.description:
Ok this is my first ever model so it's not that good but not all credit goes to me, Senne Teddy gets credit for his wings for the full dragon he made. But any ways here it is. No flaming please just constructive criticism.
Download link [Uppit]: [url=http://uppit.com/YZKTHZ]http://uppit.com/YZKTHZ[/url]
Owner Cape: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/4u6vpg.png[/img]
Admin Cape: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/svp106.png[/img]
Moderator Cape: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/23vht84.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/t683yr.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/6edbo5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2wm0xmc.png[/img] So what do you guys think?
Ints: Owner Cape ~ [code] if(i == 13964) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Equip"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 11111; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 11111; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 11111; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 400; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Owners Cape"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "The owners cape that can only be worn by amazing people.".getBytes(); // Item Examine }[/code]
Admin Cape ~ [code]if(i == 13965) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Equip"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 11112; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 11112; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 11112; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 400; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Admin Cape"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "The admin cape that can only be worn by amazing people.".getBytes(); // Item Examine }[/code]
Moderator Cape ~ [code]if(i == 13966) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Equip"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 11113; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 11113; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 11113; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 400; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Moderators Cape"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "The moderators cape that can only be worn by amazing people.".getBytes(); // Item Examine }[/code]

item.dc:creator: @mige5 mige5
item.description:
@mige5 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:27, topic:259342”][quote author=mige5 link=topic=342445.msg2663211#msg2663211 date=1234364065]
lol easy to fix, just get the cape models in .mqo files, then open with datmaker, change the “0” to “10” and then set the “animation” to “cape”
[/quote]

Lol.

Ever looked in a datmaker, there isn’t an option that just says “Cape”.[/quote]

ya just looked there and noticed that… there isnt one for capes, but i thought that there is…

ps. in my opinion there should be the mod crowns on the capes…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 11, 2009, 10:58:06 am[/size][hr]I Could fix all your problems if some1 could post me the download link for this version of datmaker:

e7i4h3.jpg668×592
